table_description: Contains data for driver's championship standings from 1950-2020, detailing driver positions, teams, and points.

table_columns.name: position
table_columns.description: The finishing position of the driver in the championship.

table_columns.name: team
table_columns.description: The team the driver raced for.

table_columns.name: wins
table_columns.description: Number of race wins in the season.

table_rules: Points systems have changed over the years, so direct points comparisons across eras may not be meaningful.
Driver names should be used consistently (e.g., 'Lewis Hamilton' not 'Hamilton, Lewis').
When analyzing driver careers, join with race_results or race_wins tables for detailed race information.
